title: Southwest Airlines Plane Hit By Gunfire On Runway In US
content: A Southwest Airlines plane was hit by gunfire while taking off from an airport in the US city of Dallas on Friday, the Federal Aviation Administration said.
summary: A Southwest Airlines plane was hit by gunfire while taking off from an airport in the US city of Dallas on Friday, the Federal Aviation Administration said.

title: PM Narendra Modi Departs For 5-Day Tour Of Nigeria, Brazil, Guyana
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi left for his five-day visit to Nigeria, Brazil, and Guyana. He will be on his three-nation tour from November 16 to 21, where he will be attending the G20 Summit in Brazil.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi left for his five-day visit to Nigeria, Brazil, and Guyana. He will be on his three-nation tour from November 16 to 21, where he will be attending the G20 Summit in Brazil.

title: Editor Of Oldest US Magazine Resigns After Calling Trump Voters "Fascists"
content: During Laura Helmuths tenure, the magazine made headlines for its rare endorsements, including a significant 2024 endorsement of Vice President Kamala Harris.
summary: During Laura Helmuths tenure, the magazine made headlines for its rare endorsements, including a significant 2024 endorsement of Vice President Kamala Harris.

title: "Ukraine War Would End Sooner With Trump In Office": Volodymyr Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said that Russia's war against his country will "end sooner" than it otherwise would have done once Donald Trump becomes US president next year.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said that Russia's war against his country will "end sooner" than it otherwise would have done once Donald Trump becomes US president next year.

title: Malcolm X's Family Sues FBI, CIA Over His Murder, Seeks $100 Million
content: Malcolm X, a civil rights leader, was assassinated on February 21, 1965, in Upper Manhattan.
summary: Malcolm X, a civil rights leader, was assassinated on February 21, 1965, in Upper Manhattan.

title: Indian Americans To Urge Trump For Sanctions Against Bangladesh
content: Indian Americans are working to reach out to the new Trump administration and the Congress next year to seek action against the Bangladeshi regime.
summary: Indian Americans are working to reach out to the new Trump administration and the Congress next year to seek action against the Bangladeshi regime.

title: SpaceX Put A Banana Sticker On Its Starship. Heres Why
content: SpaceX intends to launch Starship on November 19 within a 30-minute window starting at 3.30 am IST.
summary: SpaceX intends to launch Starship on November 19 within a 30-minute window starting at 3.30 am IST.

title: Iran's Message To US: No Intent To Assassinate Donald Trump
content: Iran has sent a message to the Joe Biden administration denying any plans to kill Donald Trump. This development comes after the Biden administration warned Iran in September that any attempt on Mr Trump's life would be considered "an act of war".
summary: Iran has sent a message to the Joe Biden administration denying any plans to kill Donald Trump. This development comes after the Biden administration warned Iran in September that any attempt on Mr Trump's life would be considered "an act of war".

title: Why A Leak Problem On International Space Station Has NASA Worried
content: The space station having a size equal to a football field must remain pressurised and filled with breathable gases at all times.
summary: The space station having a size equal to a football field must remain pressurised and filled with breathable gases at all times.

title: Storing Excess Digital Data A Sign of Distress, Say Experts
content: Like physical hoarding, digital hoarding can also be detrimental to your mental health, experts say.
summary: Like physical hoarding, digital hoarding can also be detrimental to your mental health, experts say.

title: Indian Students Being Put Off Applying To UK Universities: Report
content: Indian students are being put off applying to UK universities, adding to their financial woes at a time when education institutions are already coping with constrained budgets, a new report into the stability of the higher education sector in England
summary: Indian students are being put off applying to UK universities, adding to their financial woes at a time when education institutions are already coping with constrained budgets, a new report into the stability of the higher education sector in England

title: "We Ran Out Of Missiles": US Fighter Pilots Recall Iran's Attack On Israel
content: The F-15 fighter pilots from the US have recounted how they ran out of air-to-air missiles and switched to guns during the massive Iranian attack on Israel.
summary: The F-15 fighter pilots from the US have recounted how they ran out of air-to-air missiles and switched to guns during the massive Iranian attack on Israel.

title: Explained: The Challenges Facing Donald Trump's Key Cabinet Picks
content: Donald Trump is reportedly looking into a clause in the US Constitution that allows a president to make unilateral appointments if the Senate is not in session.
summary: Donald Trump is reportedly looking into a clause in the US Constitution that allows a president to make unilateral appointments if the Senate is not in session.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy Indicates Massive Government Job Cuts In US
content: Entrepreneur-turned politician Vivek Ramaswamy, who along with Tesla owner Elon Musk has been nominated in-charge of the Department of Government Efficiency, has indicated a massive cut in federal government jobs in the United States.
summary: Entrepreneur-turned politician Vivek Ramaswamy, who along with Tesla owner Elon Musk has been nominated in-charge of the Department of Government Efficiency, has indicated a massive cut in federal government jobs in the United States.

title: Long-Lost Sea Creatures, That Disappeared 70 Years Ago, Make A Comeback
content: The worms were found coexisting with the seahorses in coral colonies from Australia to Japan.
summary: The worms were found coexisting with the seahorses in coral colonies from Australia to Japan.

title: US Man Sues Frontier Airlines After Hot Drink Leaves His Genitals Disfigured
content: Mr Miller had requested hot tea during cabin service when the 'scalding' hot water, filled to the brim, was handed to him in a "negligent fashion".

title: Millions Leave Musk's X After Trump Win, Shift To Jack Dorsey's Bluesky

title: Trump's Team Avoids FBI Background Checks For Some Cabinet Picks: Report
content: Donald Trump and his allies feel that the FBI system is "slow," besides being plagued with issues which might prevent him from immediately starting the work of implementing his agenda, people close to the transition planning said.

title: "China Willing To Be Partners, Friends With US": Chinese Envoy
content: China is willing to be partners and friends with the United States, China's ambassador to Washington said, seeking to strengthen dialogue between the world's two largest economies.
summary: China is willing to be partners and friends with the United States, China's ambassador to Washington said, seeking to strengthen dialogue between the world's two largest economies.

title: Joe Biden Jokes He May Go To Space Station To Rescue Sunita Williams
content: US President Joe Biden on Friday joked about going to space to "bring back" the stranded astronauts - referring to Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore, who have been at the International Space Station (ISS) since June.
summary: US President Joe Biden on Friday joked about going to space to "bring back" the stranded astronauts - referring to Sunita Williams and Barry Wilmore, who have been at the International Space Station (ISS) since June.
